personalDetails.address: New Cabalan, Olongapo City, Zambales, Philippines
personalDetails.about: A Husband and a Father of 3 kids. Enthusiastic in giving value to businesses and companies by using Web Development skills. Seeking extensive experience that will be further developed and continues self improvement to give more value and become an asset to the company

education.course: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

professionalDetails.summary: An experienced Production Manager. A Web Developer with experienced in Wordpress Development. Full Stack Development with Microservice architecture. Frontend development in HTML, CSS, Javascript, ReactJS, NextJS, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS. Backend develpment in PHP, Python, NodeJs, Express and Database Management. Highly qualified and well established in a team collaboration and administrative environments that are fast paced and challenging

jobExperiences.title: Web Developer
tasks: Managing the main website in WordPress hosted in Amazon Web Service (AWS) Cloud using Secure Shell (SSH) and Github
Develop a python program that can automate the integration and update of the site
Execute SQL command to Database whenever we need to change something  like date or string
Develop and design multiple websites for lead generation using WordPress
Design and Build WordPress Websites with DIVI and Thrive Themes
Experience in full-stack development using HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Bootstrap, Python, and PHP. Database management like Phpmyadmin, MySQL, Adminer.
Proficient in Cpanel, Web Host Manager(WHM), Domain Name System (DNS), Hosting and Registrars
Practicing Python Web and desktop applications using Django, Tkinter, and SimpleGUI.
Handled different writers and paid them on a weekly basis
Experience in Digital Marketing like Copywriting. Blogging, SEO, Email Marketing and Facebook Ads

jobExperiences.title: Full Stack Developer
tasks: Develop and optimise companyâ€™s system
Produce functional web applications with interface to backend
Website Design and Optimization
Managing system day to day operations
Database modelling and SQL query using PostgresSQL and Supabase

jobExperiences.title: Production Manager
tasks: Responsible for Leading and Managing the Production
Handle 14 staff with 5 Sections (Inventory, Work order Process, Adjustment Section, Sales Order Process, and Quality Controls)
Ensuring goals are completed in a given time by having a list generated using spreadsheets
Improve efficiency and effectiveness by monitoring inventory and consumptions
Develop a PHP software for monitoring process using Codeigniter

jobExperiences.title: Production Line Leader
tasks: Supervising the production team members consists of 10 persons
Hands-on in production, grinding, polishing, welding of precious materials.
Training newly hired by showing the right practice and standard operating procedure

jobExperiences.title: Production Assistant
tasks: Buffing and polishing of acetate, titanium, and precious metals
Doing any given tasks in production according to the immediate superior
Willing to work overtimes when needed
